```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(tidyr)
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
Lake <- read.csv("./Data/Raw/NTL-LTER_Lake_Nutrients_Raw.csv",stringsAsFactors = TRUE) 

Lake$sampledate <- mdy(Lake$sampledate)
#create a subset of the data
lake_chem_subset <- Lake %>% 
  mutate(month = month(sampledate)) %>%
  filter(month ==6 & 7 & 8) %>% 
  select(lakename:daynum, depth:temperature_C) %>% 
  na.omit()
```
